title: The prophecie of Obadiah opened and applyed in sundry learned and gracious sermons preached at All-Hallowes and St Maries in Oxford by that famous and iudicious divine Iohn Rainolds D. of Divinity and late president of Corp. Chr. Coll. Published for the honour and vse of that famous Vniversity, and for the benefit of the churches of Christ abroad in the country, by W.H.
author: Rainolds, John, 1549-1607.
notes: "A sermon vpon part of the eighteenth Psalme", originally published separately in 1586, has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous.
"A sermon" identified as STC 20622 on UMI microfilm reel 1286.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the British Library.
Appears at reel 1184 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 1286 (British Library copy).
